PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(Q) ... quean 轻佻女人 queasily 令人恶心地 queasiness 恶心.

sentences.sentence: "`Do I have to remove the liver,' the medical student asked queasily"

auth_sentence.content: There's also the queasily whimsical description of its author as the "Sherlock Holmes of brain science".
auth_sentence.res_content: There's also the queasily whimsical description of its author as the "Sherlock Holmes of brain science".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's also the queasily whimsical description of its author as the "Sherlock Holmes of brain science".

auth_sentence.content: The driver was going too fast for the road; the cab floated queasily between deep, jarring potholes.
auth_sentence.res_content: The driver was going too fast for the road; the cab floated queasily between deep, jarring potholes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The driver was going too fast for the road; the cab floated queasily between deep, jarring potholes.
